Flow.description: replace to WMS FXRATE and Fix BUYING EXRATE

value.stringValue:
ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__AccountingClosingStatus__c, 'Locked After Monthly Closing') && (ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c)) )
|| ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__AccountingClosingStatus__c, 'Locked After Annual Closing') && (ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c)) )
||
ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__AccountingClosingStatus__c, 'Locked After Quarterly Closing') && (ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT([clofor_com_cfs__Billing__c].clofor_com_cfs__ApprovalStatus__c)) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_358
formulas.expression:
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.AccountingClosingStatus__c}, 'Locked After Monthly Closing') && (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c})) )
|| ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.AccountingClosingStatus__c}, 'Locked After Annual Closing') && (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c})) )
||
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.AccountingClosingStatus__c}, 'Locked After Quarterly Closing') && (ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Submitted') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Pending') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c}, 'Rejected') || ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.ApprovalStatus__c})) )
